summary: Allows you to have Nazeem's preset which will not change game's action in any way possible. This is my character save preset.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=yellow][center]INSTALL[/center][/color][/size]  
[center]You can either install this automatically with NMM or you can manually drag it to your data folder.[/center] 
[size=5][color=yellow][center][/center][/color][/size]
[size=5][color=yellow][center]What Is This?[/center][/color][/size]  
[center]This is my character preset which requires SKSE(and maybe Race Menu). This is not a save file.[/center]  
  
[size=5][color=yellow][center]How Do I Become Nazeem?[/center][/color][/size]  
[center]Firstable, you do not become Nazeem itself. You look like him, maybe twin? :)  
Open the console and type ''showracemenu'' then choose Redguard race.  Go to presets section and select ''2''. Press F9 to load the preset and now you're Nazeem!  
[size=3]Note:[/size] Changing the way you look via console also resets your stats. If you would like to keep your stats, spells and etc, get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/?]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/url] so you won't lose your stats.[/center]  
  
[size=5][color=yellow][center]Why Redguard Race?[/center][/color][/size]  
[center]Nazeem is redguard so if you choose to be Nord and then load the preset, your character won't look like Nazeem.[/center]
author: ProtologolusX
